text: Virgil Riley Runnels, Jr. (October 12, 1945 - June 11, 2015), better known as Dusty Rhodes, was a wrestler. His nickname is the "American Dream". His signature move is the "Bionic Elbow". He is the father of Dustin Rhodes and Cody Rhodes who also wrestle. He is a member of the WWE Hall of Fame when he was inducted in 2006. Rhodes died from renal failure at a hospital in Orlando, Florida, aged 69. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Professional wrestling authority figures Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:World Championship Wrestling executives Category:WWE executives Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: Dusty Rhodes
